articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Turkey proposes alternative to India-Middle East trade corridor - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The projected India-Middle East line, which would transport goods from the subcontinent to European markets via the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, and Israel, has received no backing from Turkey
articles.content: Turkey has been engaged in "intensive negotiations" to find a substitute for the India-Middle East trade corridor proposal, which was adopted at the G20 meeting this month. Turkey wants to maintain i… [+1586 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Hit by iPhone 12 radiation issue, here is what Apple will do next - HT Tech
articles.description: Authorities in France informed Apple about the iPhone 12 radiation threat and that it exceeded European Union regulations levels.
articles.content: On September 12, 2023, Apple launched its most anticipated iPhone 15 models at the grand Apple "Wonderlust" event. During the event, Apple simultaneously discontinued the iPhone 12, which was origina… [+2422 chars]

articles.author: Yara Nardi
articles.title: Italy's Meloni seeks EU mission to block migrant arrivals - Reuters
articles.description: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni called on Friday for the European Union to act jointly "with a naval mission if necessary" to prevent migrants crossing the Mediterranean from North Africa.
articles.content: LAMPEDUSA, Italy, Sept 15 (Reuters) - Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni called on Friday for the European Union to act jointly "with a naval mission if necessary" to prevent migrants crossing the… [+3494 chars]
